item.title: Picking a Second Programming Language to Learn after R
item.description: So what language should you learn after R? 1. Your goal is to be a very easy to employ data scientist: Python 2. Your goal is to become a highly paid data scientist: Scala 3. You want to understand how the R code you run actually works on the computer: C and a bit of C++ 4. You want to do more web development OR you want lots of customization/flexibility in your interactive data visualizations: JavaScript 5.
